name: 王明展
objective: 訓練工業工程與管理科系的學生，使其瞭解設施規劃的程序、步驟，熟稔傳統設施規劃分析的圖表工具，並有能力將設施規劃問題予以量化分析；進而熟悉幾種電腦化設施規劃的工具(應用軟體)。
schedule:
Part.               Content.
  1	Introduction to Facilities Planning
  2	Sources of Information
  3	Process Design
  4	Flow Analysis Techniques
  5	Activity Techniques
  6	Activity Relationship Analysis
  7	Workstation Design Line Balancing
  8	Employee-Auxiliary Services Design Space Requirement
  9	Area Allocations
 10	Alternatives of Layout
 11	Computer-Aided Layout
 12	Facilities Location
scorePolicy:
平時  15%
作業  20%
期中考30%
期末報告  35%
materials:
1.Manufacturing Facilities design and material handling, Second   
  Edith, Fred E Meyers, M. P. Stephens, 歐亞書局。
2.Facilities Planning Tompkins, International Edition, White, Bozer, 
  Tanchoco, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2003, 華泰文化。
